experience.Description: Assisted in the development of a career opportunity form and bot for Griffith Business School. I worked closely with Dr. Geoffery and gained experience in project management and maintaining effective communication with clients during a project, which unfortunately was cancelled due to privacy concerns.

I was employed as a second chef and front counter manager for Haedoori for seven months, in this time I gained valuable experience in teamwork and efficiency in the kitchen. I have also learned effective communication techniques and how to provide excellent service to customers in Australia.

experience.WorkPlace: REPUBLIC OF KOREA - NATIONAL TAX OFFICE
experience.Position: Casual Tech helper and Customer Service
Skills: ntroduce tax law and inform relevant document in person
Basic Excel and Document Management Skills.
experience.Description: I worked for a government tax administration institution, where I assisted with end-of-year tax adjustments both in person and over the phone. Before starting this job, I took the initiative to study the tax system to gain a better understanding of its workings. I utilised my customer service skills from prior jobs to provide exceptional service to taxpayers. Due to my experience with Excel and Word documents I was able to quickly adapt to the requirements of this role and efficiently navigate the tax system.

experience.WorkPlace: ST. JOHN DISABILITY WELFARE CENTRE, KOREA SEOUL
Skills: Provided hospitality services to people with disabilities.
Created Government reports using Microsoft Word and Excel.
experience.Description: I worked at a welfare facility for people and children with disabilities, where I managed official documents and helped develop policies. I mainly worked with people who had intellectual disabilities, and provided care based on their individual needs. Through this work, I developed strong people skills and learned more about the challenges faced by parents and caregivers of those with intellectual disabilities.

While working for Homeplus I developed skills in managing products and stock, with a strong attention to detail. I also gained experience working as a cashier and providing customer service, which helped me further improve my communication skills. I began as a part-time employee but was quickly promoted to a full-time position before leaving to enlist in the Korean army. During my time at Homeplus, I learned valuable lessons about customer service and communication skills.
